CustomField.formula:
IF( (LimitsMobilePushApexCallsUsed__c / LimitsMobilePushApexCallsMax__c * 100) >= 90, "⛔", IF( (LimitsMobilePushApexCallsUsed__c / LimitsMobilePushApexCallsMax__c * 100) < 90 && (LimitsMobilePushApexCallsUsed__c / LimitsMobilePushApexCallsMax__c * 100) >= 80, "⚠️", "✅" ) ) + ' ' +
TEXT(LimitsMobilePushApexCallsUsed__c) + ' / ' + TEXT(LimitsMobilePushApexCallsMax__c) + ' (' + TEXT(ROUND(LimitsMobilePushApexCallsUsed__c / LimitsMobilePushApexCallsMax__c * 100, 2)) + '%)'
CustomField.label: Mobile Push Apex Calls
